title: A brief declaracion of the Lordes Supper, written by the syngular learned man, and most constaunt martir of Iesus Christ, Nicholas Ridley Bishop of London prisoner in Oxforde, a litel before he suffred deathe for the true testimonie of Christ
author: Ridley, Nicholas, 1500?-1555.
publisher: Printed by E. van der Erve],
